ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( If_Yes_name_of_the_NetScout_Acct_Mgr__c ="", ISPICKVAL( Work_with_a_local_NetScout_Account_Mgr__c , "Yes") ) , TRUE, FALSE)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If "Work with a local NetScout Account Mgr.?" is Yes, then "If Yes,name of the NetScout Acct. Mgr.?" field must be specified.
